## Source: amazon-inspector (f865ea8e9dc8af2f134e9b7fc318eceef8ff54af8fc491d1feb2d2c5788441f4)
The package hilton-ui was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4d969be614230f9c1d44f208827c3946e62c7bee513186925c4ece9ad620e094)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'hilton-ui' @ 296.8.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
